title: Chat ban for calling someone a wife beater...............
body:
Okay so long story short. I AM SICK OF RAGING TOOLS... 
People that think if I call this player a this and that and just flat out rage at them. THEY WILL PLAY BETTER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

So due to this. I started calling them wife beaters. Beat there wife and blame them for it.
Because this is what it is like.
Someone calls me a f'ing N word. Why dont you kill your self you fing N word. Then 5 mins later. Can you come help us.

WTF I get chat ban because of that. This is getting be on the joke now Riot. I know for a fact and can prove it you cannot ban peoples accounts. 
But you chat ban me for standing up for my self and make them understand what it is there doing?

I SAID AND I QUOTE THIS

Why should I try. 2 of you are toxic as fuck.
I BET YOU ARE A WIFE BEATER... Beat your wife then blame her for it.
WTF IS WITH THIS WIFE BEATER MENTAL ISSUES!!!

I lose chat for it. Does anyone even see the full logs before they take the chat away? Or is just " Once you get 2 or 3 game reports " TAKE CHAT!!!
